solution_line_template: First find the total number of items Carla needs to find by adding the number of leaves to the number of bugs: {leaves_needed} leaves + {bugs_needed} bugs = <<{leaves_needed}+{bugs_needed}={total_items}>>{total_items} items

Now divide the total number of items by the number of days Carla has to do her assignment to find the daily collection amount: {total_items} items / {days_due} days = <<{total_items}/{days_due}={daily_collection_amount}>>{daily_collection_amount} items/day
